author: Universal Pictures
description:
A wild ride through some of Jim Carrey’s most memorable moments — from Fletcher’s courtroom meltdown in Liar Liar to the chaotic holiday heist in How The Grinch Stole Christmas, and a surprising hero turn as Colonel Stars and Stripes in Kick-Ass 2. Comedy, madness, and justice — all delivered the Carrey way.
